name: Dragon's Dream
overview: Dragon's Dream (ドラゴンズドリーム) is a Sega Saturn RPG released exclusively in Japan. Very little is known about this title, only that it was distributed in very low numbers for free in order to promote the Saturn's online capabilities in Japan. Sega had planned a PC version, but this never materialised. For a short time, there were also mentions of the XBAND version.
